Package edu.puj.toolmaster.tools.services

Class ToolService

java.lang.Object
edu.puj.toolmaster.tools.services.ToolService
@Service public class ToolService extends Object
Interacts with database to retrieve Tools data achieving Single Responsibility

    • addNewTool

      public Tool addNewTool(@NonNull @NonNull Tool tool) throws ResourceBadRequestException, EntityAlreadyExistsException
      Add a new tool to the database Brand and City can be either specify an ID or a name, if record doesn't exist it will be created using name
      Parameters:
      tool - New tool to be added
      Returns:
      Tool added or null if not a valid tool
      Throws:
      ResourceBadRequestException - Bad resource description
      EntityAlreadyExistsException - The entity could not be added because it already exists

      Parameters:

      Throws:
      ResourceNotFoundException - Resource doesn't exist

      Parameters:
      id - ID of the tool to be updated
      tool - Tool with non-null fields
      Returns:
      Updated tool
      Throws:
      ResourceBadRequestException - Tool had null fields or parsing failed
